org.springframework.data.redis.connection

接口 RedisServerCommands

  • 所有已知子接口:
    DefaultedRedisClusterConnection, DefaultedRedisConnection, RedisClusterConnection, RedisClusterServerCommands, RedisCommands, RedisConnection, StringRedisConnection
    所有已知实现类:
    org.springframework.data.redis.connection.AbstractRedisConnection, DefaultStringRedisConnection, JedisClusterConnection, JedisConnection, LettuceClusterConnection, LettuceConnection

    public interface RedisServerCommands
    Server-specific commands supported by Redis.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  RedisServerCommands.MigrateOption 
      static class  RedisServerCommands.ShutdownOption 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void bgReWriteAof()
      Start an Append Only File rewrite process on server.
      void bgSave()
      Start background saving of db on server.
      default void bgWriteAof()
      已过时。 
      As of 1.3, use bgReWriteAof().
      Long dbSize()
      Get the total number of available keys in currently selected database.
      void flushAll()
      Delete all all keys from all databases.
      void flushDb()
      Delete all keys of the currently selected database.
      List<RedisClientInfo> getClientList()
      Request information and statistics about connected clients.
      String getClientName()
      Returns the name of the current connection.
      Properties getConfig(String pattern)
      Load configuration parameters for given pattern from server.
      Properties info()
      Load default server information like memory cpu utilization replication
      Properties info(String section)
      Load server information for given selection.
      void killClient(String host, int port)
      Closes a given client connection identified by host:port.
      Long lastSave()
      Get time of last bgSave() operation in seconds.
      void migrate(byte[] key, RedisNode target, int dbIndex, RedisServerCommands.MigrateOption option)
      Atomically transfer a key from a source Redis instance to a destination Redis instance.
      void migrate(byte[] key, RedisNode target, int dbIndex, RedisServerCommands.MigrateOption option, long timeout)
      Atomically transfer a key from a source Redis instance to a destination Redis instance.
      void resetConfigStats()
      Reset statistic counters on server.
      void save()
      Synchronous save current db snapshot on server.
      void setClientName(byte[] name)
      Assign given name to current connection.
      void setConfig(String param, String value)
      Set server configuration for param to value.
      void shutdown()
      Shutdown server.
      void shutdown(RedisServerCommands.ShutdownOption option)
      Shutdown server.
      void slaveOf(String host, int port)
      Change redis replication setting to new master.
      void slaveOfNoOne()
      Change server into master.
      Long time()
      Request server timestamp using TIME command.

    • 方法详细资料

      • bgWriteAof

        @Deprecated
default void bgWriteAof()
        已过时。 As of 1.3, use bgReWriteAof().
        Start an Append Only File rewrite process on server.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: BGREWRITEAOF

      • bgReWriteAof

        void bgReWriteAof()
        Start an Append Only File rewrite process on server.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.3
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: BGREWRITEAOF

      • bgSave

        void bgSave()
        Start background saving of db on server.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: BGSAVE

      • lastSave

        @Nullable
Long lastSave()
        Get time of last bgSave() operation in seconds.
        返回:
        null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: LASTSAVE

      • save

        void save()
        Synchronous save current db snapshot on server.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: SAVE

      • dbSize

        @Nullable
Long dbSize()
        Get the total number of available keys in currently selected database.
        返回:
        null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: DBSIZE

      • flushDb

        void flushDb()
        Delete all keys of the currently selected database.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: FLUSHDB

      • flushAll

        void flushAll()
        Delete all all keys from all databases.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: FLUSHALL

      • info

        @Nullable
Properties info()
        Load default server information like
        • memory
        • cpu utilization
        • replication

        返回:
        null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: INFO

      • info

        @Nullable
Properties info(String section)
        Load server information for given selection.
        返回:
        null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: INFO

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Shutdown server.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: SHUTDOWN

      • shutdown

        void shutdown(RedisServerCommands.ShutdownOption option)
        Shutdown server.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.3
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: SHUTDOWN

      • getConfig

        @Nullable
Properties getConfig(String pattern)
        Load configuration parameters for given pattern from server.
        参数:
        pattern - must not be null.
        返回:
        null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: CONFIG GET

      • setConfig

        void setConfig(String param,
               String value)
        Set server configuration for param to value.
        参数:
        param - must not be null.
        value - must not be null.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: CONFIG SET

      • resetConfigStats

        void resetConfigStats()
        Reset statistic counters on server.
        Counters can be retrieved using info().
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: CONFIG RESETSTAT

      • time

        @Nullable
Long time()
        Request server timestamp using TIME command.
        返回:
        current server time in milliseconds or null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.1
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: TIME

      • killClient

        void killClient(String host,
                int port)
        Closes a given client connection identified by host:port.
        参数:
        host - of connection to close.
        port - of connection to close
        从以下版本开始:
        1.3
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: CLIENT KILL

      • setClientName

        void setClientName(byte[] name)
        Assign given name to current connection.
        参数:
        name -
        从以下版本开始:
        1.3
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: CLIENT SETNAME

      • getClientName

        @Nullable
String getClientName()
        Returns the name of the current connection.
        返回:
        null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.3
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: CLIENT GETNAME

      • getClientList

        @Nullable
List<RedisClientInfo> getClientList()
        Request information and statistics about connected clients.
        返回:
        List of RedisClientInfo objects or null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.3
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: CLIENT LIST

      • slaveOf

        void slaveOf(String host,
             int port)
        Change redis replication setting to new master.
        参数:
        host - must not be null.
        port -
        从以下版本开始:
        1.3
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: SLAVEOF

      • slaveOfNoOne

        void slaveOfNoOne()
        Change server into master.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.3
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: SLAVEOF

      • migrate

        void migrate(byte[] key,
             RedisNode target,
             int dbIndex,
             @Nullable
             RedisServerCommands.MigrateOption option)
        Atomically transfer a key from a source Redis instance to a destination Redis instance. On success the key is deleted from the original instance and is guaranteed to exist in the target instance.
        参数:
        key - must not be null.
        target - must not be null.
        dbIndex -
        option - can be null. Defaulted to RedisServerCommands.MigrateOption.COPY.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.7
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: MIGRATE

      • migrate

        void migrate(byte[] key,
             RedisNode target,
             int dbIndex,
             @Nullable
             RedisServerCommands.MigrateOption option,
             long timeout)
        Atomically transfer a key from a source Redis instance to a destination Redis instance. On success the key is deleted from the original instance and is guaranteed to exist in the target instance.
        参数:
        key - must not be null.
        target - must not be null.
        dbIndex -
        option - can be null. Defaulted to RedisServerCommands.MigrateOption.COPY.
        timeout -
        从以下版本开始:
        1.7
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: MIGRATE
